amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike funding for International Broadcasting Operations and Broadcasting Capital Improvements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the section relating to International Broadcasting Operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 88 - 333 (Roll no. 50).
